txt.en: Defeat many Orcs and half-orcs in the Vales of Anduin.
Many more wandering Orcs have been defeated. The Wilderfolk of the Vales of Anduin are grateful for your aid.

'Anyone who says that half-orcs are twice the trouble has never had the pleasure of facing down a raiding party of pillaging Orcs. I would take two half-orcs for every one of their full-blooded cousins.' - Skalla, Captain of Vegb√°r
Defeat many Orcs and half-orcs in the Vales of Anduin
